full_summary:
### RFP : Web Developer
#### Solicitation # 01B68-22-0069

#### Documents Provided By:
Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada

#### Notice Details:
* Contract Title: Web Developer
* Solicitation Number: 01B68-22-0069
* Publication Date: 2023-02-16
* Tender Closing Date: 2023-03-09 (12:00 PM EST)
* Anticipated Start Date: Upon contract signature
* Estimated Delivery Date: 2024-03-31

#### Opportunity Details:
* Category: SRV (Services)
* Classification: Informatics Professional Services
* Trade Agreements: WTO GPA, CKFTA, CFTA; Comprehensive Land Claim Agreement Applies: No
* Number of Contracts: 1

#### Description:
The Department of Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada (AAFC) invites bids for Web Developer services on a “as-need” basis. The services will be used to update and publish content on AAFC’s Internet and Intranet sites/pages. The contract will have a duration of one year, with an option to extend it for up to three additional one-year periods.

#### Eligibility:
This requirement is open only to Task-Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) Supply Arrangement (SA) Holders who have qualified under Tier 1 in the National Capital Region for the following categories: RESOURCE CATEGORY - A.14 WEB Developer LEVEL 1

#### Required Documents:
The proposal must include the following documents:

* Company profile and experience in web development
* Description of resources to be used for the project
* Security requirement: Common PS SRCL #6 applies
* CVs of personnel to be assigned to the project

#### Proposal Evaluation Method:
The proposals will be evaluated based on the following criteria: expertise, project approach, and pricing.

#### Closing Details:
Please note that the Consultative Tendering platform (Buyandsell.gc.ca) is not responsible for the distribution of solicitation documents. Bidders are advised to address their questions and concerns directly to the Contracting Authority named above.

#### Contact Information:
* Rhonda DiMarco
* Email: rhonda.dimarco@agr.gc.ca
* Phone: Not available
* Address: 1341 Baseline Road, Ottawa, ON K1A 0C5, Canada

Note: Please verify the details of this tender announcement as the contractor may be missing essential details. Ask the contractor for further information before proceeding
